TextBlock.Text: KAZI: Rava, we can't just sit here and wait to die! We may have all the metal we'll ever need, but we can't live on that alone!
RAVA: Kazi, what you're suggesting is dangerous, this is an unexplored technology. It could kill us all.
KAZI: is it worse than starving in our own home?
RAVA: You may be a scientist but you aren't a leader. Please, come back with something, anything else.
KAZI: Ok, let me talk to Jai.
